dc.title: IVS Home Page
dc.description: The International VLBI Service for Geodesy and Astrometry (IVS) provides a service to support geodetic, geophysical and astrometric research and operational activities. It promotes research and development activities in all aspects of the geodetic and astrometric VLBI technique.
